snippet: Mr. Escaich’s Concerto for Violin, Oboe and Orchestra received its American premiere at a New York Philharmonic concert at Avery Fisher Hall.
abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews classical music concert, featuring American premiere of Thierry Escaich work Concerto for Violin, Oboe and Orchestra, performed by New York Philharmonic, violinist Lisa Batiashvili and oboist Francois Leleux at Avery Fisher Hall.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Escaich’s Concerto for Violin, Oboe and Orchestra received its American premiere at a New York Philharmonic concert at Avery Fisher Hall.

headline.main: Review: With Bach as a Catalyst, Thierry Escaich’s Lavish Concerto
headline.print_headline: From Snippets of Bach, a Grand Tapestry Unfurls
